name: Application development to aid less privileged
description: App will aid easy access to donor and less privileged people
SDGevidence:
This chairty is almost 2 years old and what we majorly do is to reach out to less privileged people and get them clothes collected from all over the world ( USa , Canada , Uk) we have people sending us messages on IG and website asking to send their clothes and also to sponsor orphans in sending them to sch.
